body_html:
The main reason is to allow these implementations to be used in user defined distributions. E.g.

class LogGamma(Distribution):
    def __init__(self, alpha, beta):
        self._gamma = Gamma(alpha, beta)
    def rsample(self):
        return self._gamma.rsample().log()

@register_kl(LogGamma, LogGamma)
def kl_loggamma_loggamma(p, q):
    return kl_gamma_gamma(p._gamma, q._gamma)

If the _kl_gamma_gamma() were private, then kl_loggamma_loggamma() would need to use kl_divergence() under the hood, hitting the registry twice each call.
